verses.content: Chuongchun, LALPA in dinga Solomonin sin a thaw po po chu zo a ni tah a. Chun, Solomon chun a pa Davidin thil a lo hlân tah tangka dâm, rângkachak dâm, bûr le bêl po pohai chu a hung lâk lût a, Pathien in ro siekhâwmna hmuna chun a sie tah a.

Chun, Solomon chun David khawpui Ziona LALPA thuthlungna bâwm chu hung la dingin, Israel thlahai pahnamhai laia ṭhuoituhai, hnam tin laia luhai le, Israel upahai chu Jerusalema chun a ko khâwm tâwl tah a.
Israel mihai po po chu thla sarinaa ruoiṭhenaa chun lal kuoma chun an hung khâwm vawng a.
Israel upahai po po chu an hung a, Levi mihai chun bâwm chu an zâwn tah a.
Chun, bâwm le, intuokna puon in le puon ina bûr le bêl inthienghai po po le chun an zu lâk tah a; hieng thilhai hi thiempu Levi mihai chun an zu lâk a nih.
Lal Solomon le Israel mipui ama hmaa hung inkhâwmhai po po chun berâm le bâwngchal a tam tienga tiem sênglo le hril thei lo chun inthâwiin, bâwm hmaa chun an um a.
Chun, thiempuhai chun LALPA thuthlungna bâwm chu, chu in hmun inthieng, hmun inthiengtaka cherub- hai thla zar hnuoia a hmun dinga chun an hung lâklût tah a.
Cherubhai chun an thlahai chun bâwm umna hmun chu an zârkhum a, cherubhai chun bâwm le chutaka a zâwnfunghai chu an inkhum sa sih a.
Chun, a zâwnfunghai chu an sei êm a, zâwnfung hmawrhai chu hmun inthieng hmaa inthawkin ân hmu thei a; amiruokchu, puotienga in- thawk chun ân hmu thei nawh a; chutaka chun tu chen hin a um tah a.
Chu bâwm sûnga chun, Aigupta rama inthawka an hung suok laia Israel thlahai kuoma LALPAIN thu- thlung a siem laia Mosien Horeba lungphêk pahni a sie lût chau naw kha chu ieng dang khawm a um nawh a.
Chun, thiempuhai chu hmun inthienga inthawka an hung suok chun, (thiempu chutaka um po pohai chu an pâwl hunbi nghâk kher loin sukthieng an ni hlak sih a;

Levi mi chutaka hla saktuhai khawm chu an rêngin, Asaph hai, Heman hai, Jeduthun hai, an naupasalhai le an unauhai leh puon zai inhmi puona inthuomin, per- khuong leh, ṭingṭang leh dârben- thekhai leh mâichâm tâwp saktieng panga chun an ngîr a; anni lai chun thiempu za le sâwmhni tawtawrâwt mûttuhai an um bawk a):

LALPA inpâka, lâwmthu hrila, hla saktuhai le tawtawrâwt puhai chu pakhat ang el a, ri inremtaka hriet a ni hlak a; tawtawrâwthai le, dârbenthekhai le, rimawi thawna thuomhnawhai leh an râwlhai an insuo a, LALPA chu inpâka, “Ama chu a ṭha sih a; a zângaina chu kum- khuoin um zing a tih,” an ti pha chun, LALPA in chu sûmin a hung sip hlak a,
chuongchun, thiempuhai chu sûm lei chun rawngbâwl dingin an ngîr zing thei ta ngai nawh a, LALPA ropuina chun Pathien in chu a hung suksip hlak leiin.
